name: Scary Mall
description:
this is just a test. if I like it I might continue. if you like it feel free to leave suggestions, ideas, stories or cocnepts to add to my little project.

this game might be scary, so watch out! :0

you are a girl, lost in a mall. the mall is strange and makes you scared. faces and closed shops surround you while you desperately try to escape.

i was thinking about adding more floors and make it sort of a laybrinth, puzzle game where you had to run awya some times from a very scary enemy.

i hope you'll like it.

it's recommended to play this game together with a brave friend during the middle of the day.
